caption.p: Area averaged multimodel ensemble mean snowmelt (mm) and snow water equivalent (mm) for the historic (1971–2000, black), near (2010–2039, red), and end period (2070–2099, blue) under RCP 2.6 and RCP 8.5 for Satluj River basin. Shaded regions show intermodel variation for 10 CMIP5-GCMs for historic, near, and end period. The figure was developed using the Generic Mapping Tools (GMT) version 5.4.2 ( http://gmt.soest.hawaii.edu).
